# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book presents SciViews::R, an R dialect that is intended to make the R language more accessible. It also list functions that make part of the language and indicate where they diverge from base R, Tidyverse, or other additions to plain R.

```{r, include=FALSE}
if (!"SciViews:R" %in% search())
  source("R/SciViews.R", attach(NULL, name = "SciViews:R"))
fn_clear()
```
